1252310.name: Insurgence - Second Assault Early Bird Package
1252310.description:
ABOUT THIS DIGITAL EARLY BIRD PACKAGE

This DLC package is a present for all early adopters of Insurgence - Second Assault.

After 30 days, this package will either completely disappear or become paid content.

  • 3 Post Card in A6 Format 300Dpi for Prints.
  • Mini Album containing 5 In Game Music + 3 Bonus Track, Composed by SHIDO STRIFE
  • 4 Wallpaper in QHD Format
  • Special Notes from Developer.

Tracklist

  • 1. With All Your Might (Final Boss Theme)
  • 2. Pierce (Special Boss Theme)
  • 3. Fierce Battle (Battle Theme 2)
  • 4. Road Not Taken (Dungeon Theme)
  • 5. Heroic (Scene Theme)
  • 6. Bloodstained Tears (CZAR: Decision Boss Theme)
  • 7. Burn (Bonus Track from Upcoming YSY SOFTWORKS Project)
  • 8. Monolith (Bonus Track from Upcoming YSY SOFTWORKS Project)


To open the DLC : Right click on Insurgence -Second Assault on your game list,
Click Properties > Local Files > Browse Local Files and open "Bonus" Folder
